title: Post Doc Sphere
stack: React, Tailwind css, Node.js, Express.js , MySQL
description: The Automated PDRF Management System streamlines application tracking, progress monitoring, stipend allocation, and collaborations. It features real-time updates, early detection mechanisms, automated progress reporting, and a host matching algorithm to enhance efficiency and support. Additionally, robust data management protocols ensure consistency and accuracy, while insightful reporting tools aid decision-making. Built with scalability and flexibility in mind, the system improves oversight, reduces administrative workload, and fosters productive collaborations, ultimately enhancing the effectiveness of the PDRF program.

title: Obstacle Avoid
description: Obstacle Avoid is a fast-paced arcade-style game developed using libGDX, where players navigate a dynamic environment and dodge incoming obstacles to achieve the highest score possible. Built from scratch with a custom game engine, the game features adjustable difficulty levels, a persistent high score system using libGDX Preferences, and intuitive controls for an engaging user experience. Designed to challenge reflexes and focus, Obstacle Avoid showcases my ability to implement core game mechanics, manage game state, and deliver a polished gameplay experience.
